name: Graydle Mothership
text: Once per turn, if you control a monster that is owned by your opponent: You can target 1 card on the field; Destroy it. If you Synchro Summon a "Graydle" Synchro monster: You can target "Graydle" cards in your GY up to the number of Synchro materials used for the Summon of that monster; Shuffle them into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card.
